nodes.text: The Nashal Medical Center was a small hospital in the city of Nashal on Talus. It had beds for several patients and medical equipment, including a 2-1B surgical droid, to treat them.
Inexperienced medics would often seek out this facility to learn the necessary skills of their profession from experienced doctors and combat medics.

This medical center is a building in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. It is not part of any quest in the game. In the early years of the game, players of the medic and doctor professions could heal other players' wounds in these buildings. Just being inside such a building would also slowly heal the player's wounds over time.
Before the Doctor and Combat Medic professions were removed from the game in 2005, trainer NPCs in the Medical Center could teach players of these professions new skills.
